My name is Elisabeth Miles. I do UX design and front-end development. I am currently employed with Outright.com, which makes accounting software for small businesses and online sellers.

I live in San Francisco and have over 12 years experience designing web applications. Below are some of the projects I've been working on, recently. Enjoy.
